item.title: Stop Waiting for "Junior" Roles: AI Ate the First Rung â€” Build Your Own Ladder
item.description: The market isn’t dead, it’s re-shaped. AI steamrolled the routine tasks that used to train juniors, so postings look scarce even while long-term demand stays strong. The move now: AI-augmented learning, a portfolio of proof, and skills that sit above the autocomplete line. Companies that want leaders later need to rebuild apprenticeships now (with AI as scaffolding, not a headcount eraser).
